verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> or <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>. Keep not thou <S%H1824>silence<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>: hold not thy <S%H2790>peace<s%>, and be not <S%H8252>still<s%>, O <S%H410>God<s%>.
For, lo, thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> make a <S%H1993>tumult<s%>: and they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee have lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%>.
They have taken <S%H6191>crafty<s%> <S%H5475>counsel<s%> against thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H3289>consulted<s%> against thy hidden <S%H6845>ones<s%>.

They have <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us cut them <S%H3582>off<s%> from being a <S%H1471>nation<s%>; that the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may be no more in <S%H2142>remembrance<s%>.
For they have <S%H3289>consulted<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> with one <S%H3820>consent<s%>: they <S%H3772>are<s%> <S%H1285>confederate<s%> against thee:
The <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%>; of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and the <S%H1905>Hagarenes<s%>;
<S%H1381>Gebal<s%>, and <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>; the <S%H6429>Philistines<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>;
<S%H804>Assur<s%> also is <S%H3867>joined<s%> with them: they have <S%H2220>holpen<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
<S%H6213>Do<s%> unto them as unto the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>; as to <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, as to <S%H2985>Jabin<s%>, at the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H7028>Kison<s%>:
Which <S%H8045>perished<s%> at <S%H5874>En-dor<s%>: they became as <S%H1828>dung<s%> for the <S%H127>earth<s%>.
<S%H7896>Make<s%> their <S%H5081>nobles<s%> like <S%H6159>Oreb<s%>, and like <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%>: yea, all their <S%H5257>princes<s%> as <S%H2078>Zebah<s%>, and as <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>:
Who <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us take to ourselves the <S%H4999>houses<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3423>possession<s%>.
O my <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H7896>make<s%> them like a <S%H1534>wheel<s%>; as the <S%H7179>stubble<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>.
As the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1197>burneth<s%> a <S%H3293>wood<s%>, and as the <S%H3852>flame<s%> <S%H3857>setteth<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> on <S%H3857>fire<s%>;
So <S%H7291>persecute<s%> them with thy <S%H5591>tempest<s%>, and make them <S%H926>afraid<s%> with thy <S%H5492>storm<s%>.
<S%H4390>Fill<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> with <S%H7036>shame<s%>; that they may <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
Let them be <S%H954>confounded<s%> and <S%H926>troubled<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>; yea, let them be put to <S%H2659>shame<s%>, and <S%H6>perish<s%>:
That men may <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> alone is <S%H3068>JEHOVAH<s%>, art the most <S%H5945>high<s%> over all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
